text: Broadway Danny Rose is a 1984 American comedy movie directed by Woody Allen (who also stars) and starring Mia Farrow, Nick Apollo Forte, Danny Aiello, Gloria Parker. It was distributed by Orion Pictures and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1985. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen
title: Broadway Danny Rose
